Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:46:17
Folder: CJMMULV - farewell!
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CJMMULV_00
From: Nadine Kubab </O=EXCHANGELABS/OU=EXCHANGE ADMINISTRATIVE GROUP (FYDIBOHF23SPDLT)/CN=RECIPIENTS/CN=E8B8188C36714B969454B9530AFADC38-NADINE KUBA>
To: 
CC: Nadine Kubab <nadinekubab@hotmail.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-09-26 21:24
Subject: Farewell!
--------------------------------------------------
Hello everyone,

 

This one is for all the business and operational teams!

 

It is with a bittersweet feeling that I am saying goodbye to you all, after 11 years with Chalhoub Group. 

 

As I prepare for a new chapter, I look back on the past decade +1 (every year counts) and I am filled with so many emotions. What a ride that was! 

 

I am going to try and keep it short (like the infamous one pager agreement lots of you asked for, rather than enjoying and indulging in the endless pages of contracts I sent you). 

 

A heartfelt thank you to each and every one of you! Working alongside you was a teaching experience on so many levels and I come out of it grateful!

 

I sincerely wish you all the very best for the future and would love to keep in touch! (nadinekubab@hotmail.com (yes still on hotmail;) ) - 0567002171). 

 

Take good care of yourself and loved ones!

 

Warmest regards,

Nadine 

NADINE KUBAB​​​​	
DIRECTOR ‑ LEGAL	
M.C.T. FZE	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES	
+971 4 804 5045
